subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Seattle Seahawks made the playoffs this season with a 9-7 record, were host to a first-round game by winning the worst division in the N.F.L., and advanced to the second round because of a botched field goal.
snippet: The Seattle Seahawks made the playoffs this season with a 9-7 record, were host to a first-round game by winning the worst division in the N.F.L., and advanced to the second round because of a botched field goal.
